short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a bar indicating a score of the political bias of search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An addition to Google Search with a score of potential political bias of the sources in the search results. The data on political bias is extracted and normalized from:

https://adfontesmedia.com/interactive-media-bias-chart/

The score is calculated based on the ranking of each link (first link has an exponentially higher weight) and the size of each link (the larger h3 links get higher weights, too). Looking for more data sources to make it more accurate and less dependent on one site. Open-source project!
